snippet.title: A Rite from the Stars - Trailer v3
snippet.description:
The development of A Rite from the Stars goes on! A 3D point & click graphic adventure. The story of a mute boy and his path to become a man.

-- NOW ON KICKSTARTER -- 

http://bit.ly/ARFTS_KS

Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles...
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RisinGoat
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RisinGoat
Website: http://risingoat.com

Download the demo of the game from our Kickstarter Page:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/risingoat/a-rite-from-the-stars-a-3d-graphic-adventure
